title: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, strengthening their ability to design language education modules applying UDL principles in smartphone-dominant learning environments

learning_goals: The three UDL principles (engagement, representation, action/expression) can be applied to language learning activities.
Smartphone-optimized educational materials can be designed to accommodate diverse learner needs.
Formative assessment results can be analyzed to propose UDL-based instructional improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
